domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
@STVKathryn Covid19 is the human form, somehow doubt a cat got it.
There are many coronavirus's both in animals and humans.
Have been around for 100s of years.
Like the common cold for example, being the most common one.
Household cats and dogs have coronavirus's very often.
